productsDescription: Nalinv has an intelligent production line for the preparation, dispersion and wet granulation of nano-powders. At the same time, we have a pilot-scale industrial base (film, board, plastic film, injection molding, spinning and polymerization) , and integration of a number of nanomaterials research institutions to achieve from basic research to applied research, from industrialization to market-oriented overall layout.
aboutUsContent:
Nalinv Nanotechnology (Shanghai)

The company takes inorganic nano application research and development as the core, nano-modified plastics as the basis, and integrates nano metal oxide powder preparation, disperse grinding, wet granling, bidirectional stretch film processing and manufacturing as one, creating a vertical whole industry chain.
